settings.admin_bypass_warning:
Due to the nature of Flarum's permissions system, members of the Admin group will
not see any ads on the forum. If you wish to test your ads, please visit the forum
in an Incognito or Private window.
settings.script_deletion: To remove a script, leave the textbox blank and press 'Save Changes'.
settings.code_input_disabled: Enable this location to edit its HTML code.
settings.js_input_disabled: Enable this location to edit its JS code.
settings.allow_after_placeholder: Between posts: show ad after reply placeholder

alert.fix_errors: Please fix errors above before saving changes
alert.code_has_script: One or more of your ad units contain script tags, which are not allowed. Remove these and try again.

settings.warning:
Instructions:

HTML - Insert HTML content for the ad in this box. Do not insert any {script} tags in this box. They will not be run.

JS - Insert custom Javascript code to insert in a script tag. This should NOT include the {script} tag itself.
